    • Method Detail

      • getMethodsWithAnnotations

        @Nonnull
public static List<Method> getMethodsWithAnnotations(Class<?> type,
                                             Class<? extends Annotation>... annotations)
        Gets the list of Methods in the passed type that have all of the passed predicates.
        Parameters:
        type - the class in which to search
        annotations - the annotation(s) to search for
        Returns:
        a list of methods in type and contain all the annotations in annotations
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if type is null or any annotation in annotations is null

      • containsAllAnnotations

        public static com.google.common.base.Predicate<Method> containsAllAnnotations(Class<? extends Annotation>... annotations)
        Creates a Predicate that matches methods that contain all the passed annotations.
        Parameters:
        annotations - the list of annotations to match
        Returns:
        a Predicate that matches methods that contain all the passed annotations
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any annotation in annotations is null

      • containsAnnotation

        public static com.google.common.base.Predicate<Method> containsAnnotation(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation)
        Creates a Predicate that matches methods that contain the passed annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation to match
        Returns:
        a Predicate that matches methods that contain the passed annotation
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any annotation is null
